about_the_game:
It's time to be evil. Build and master your dungeon, hire despicable monsters, and rise to conquer the overworld. Gaze from below as your dark tendrils creep across the land, snatching treasures from the forces of good and funding an ever growing empire. But beware! Saint Million the Hero King and his table of royal knights are always watching. Leave your dungeon weak, and a single cleave from the hero's sword will end your reign.

My Infamous Dungeon is a roguelite dungeon builder. Take time to carefully plan your dungeon, then protect it against waves of greedy heroes.

Features

An ever-changing dungeon

Build a unique dungeon every time. Combine over 6 monsters clans and 20 professions to uncover devious synergies and menacing strategies. Roguelite elements bring improvisation and variety to each playthrough.

Control the pace

Heroes enter the dungeon when you allow it. Take your time to plan your dungeon and lay devilish traps, then test your work against waves of delightfully foolish heroes.

Change the world

Carefully plan your route through the overworld. Conquer different towns to earn unique upgrades, and optimize your strategy before the journey's end. Even the most evil of quests must finish at the hero's castle, where the king waits.

Grow your infamy

Each victory earns infamy. Relentlessly stretch your sinister grasp over the land until all the great monsters clans know your name. Use that dark reputation to unlock new monsters, spells, and artifacts.

name: My Infamous Dungeon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10 / 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

short_description: Be evil. Build your dungeon and grow your empire in this roguelite dungeon builder. Hire monsters, set traps, battle heroes, and conquer the overworld with an ever expanding legion of evil.
